long_description: You've signed up for your next big running race, now get the gear to help you meet your goal. The Marmot Tilden Running cap helps you keep a cool head, and it shades your face from sun and rain. Lightweight polyester mesh keeps your head cool when you're working hard. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Marmot Tilden Running cap includes an adjustable strap in back for a perfect fit.
short_description: You've signed up for your next big running race, now get the gear to help you meet your goal. The Marmot Tilden Running cap helps you keep a cool head, and it shades your face from sun and rain.
